::Surgital/Hell Drak/Necromancer/Symphony::

Surgital laughed.

"You really want to know?  He got reprogrammed into a Decepticon named
Nightstrike!  Happy!!!???" Surgital yelled, avoiding her shots.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hell Drak and Necromancer saw Blindfear firing at their Maximal friends.

"I'm gonna stick to my bet, bro!  Decepticreep, here I come!" Hell Drak
said, taking aim on Triggerhappy.

Hell Drak fired 2 plasma beams at Blindfear, then waited until Triggerhappy
got low, so she could climb onto him.  Necromancer fired 4 lazer(hehe
anybody notice how I spell laser as lazer?) discz at Blindfear.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
From almost out of nowhere, Symphony appeared behind Blindfear.

"FOR MAXIMALS!  FOR MY BROTHERS!  THIS IS FOR YOU, ORCHESTRA AND COMPOSER,
IF I EVER FIND YOU!!!" Symphony yelled with a brave spark, firing 25 shots
from his gatling gun at Blindfear from behind the blind bot.
